```{r}
# filenames
lst_files <- list.files(pattern = ".csv")

lst_files
# colnames load
cnames <- read.csv2(lst_files[1])[, 1]

# load
data_sets <- lapply(lst_files, \(file) read.csv2(file)[, -1] |> as.matrix())

# divide
Map(\(mat, writename){
  
 # bind and calc
 tmp <- cbind("Region" = cnames, mat / (data_sets[[1]]) * 100)
 
 # write to csv
 write.csv2(tmp, paste0("./../", writename), row.names = FALSE)
 
}, tail(data_sets, 3), tail(lst_files, 3))
```
